item.title: Foundation Models for Structured Data @ ICML
item.description: We will be a poster on our work on using foundation models for time series to model epidemics, at the workshop on Foundation Models for Structured Data of the International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML).

item.title: PrEP policies in the EU: poster at ESCAIDE + talk at ECOSOCEPI
item.description: A new study assessing PrEP policies across countries in the European Union will soon be out. In the meantime, Boxuan presenting a poster at the ESCAIDE - the European conference on applied epidemiology. At the same time, our collaborator Sofia Teixeira is giving the talk at the ECOSOCEPI workshop at ISI Foundation.

item.title: Boxuan, Claudio Eugenio & Suprabhath presenting
item.description:
We are at the Scientific Days of the Coordinated Action “Modelling of Infectious Diseases” of ANRS-MIE.

This year we are at EHESP in Rennes.

item.title: Annual meeting of the French Consortium 'Infectious Disease Modeling'
item.description:
We will be attending the annual meeting of the Consortium Infectious Disease Modeling - French: Action Coordonnée Modélisation des maladies infectieuses (AC Modélisation) -, of which Eugenio is a member of the Scientific Committee. The AC Modélisation is the network of French epidemic modelers under the umbrella of ANRS-MIE (INSERM agency for the research on HIV, TB, STI, viral hepatitis and emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases).

Claudio will also be presenting a poster.
